name: Neopolis - Play the City
description:
Turn your city into a giant board game by buying and selling real world buildings!

More than 110 million buildings available
Make an offer to buy the town hall of your city, your office or your favorite bar, but also the Empire State Building or the White House! Covet the most popular buildings: every time another player visits one of your buildings, you will earn more money!

Compete against the players of your town and the best USA players !
Attack and auction your opponent's buildings using the cards at your disposal in this massively multi-player game.

Collect items to craft the best real estate strategy!
What combination of items will allow you to make the most of your buildings?
Should you invest in bars, offices or shops to become the best player in your city?

Use your cards at the best time
Earn bonuses or send penalties to your competitors by collecting a wide variety of cards with different powers.

Explore and (re) discover your city!
Geolocated, explore your city to discover and accumulate buildings in order to unlock rewards and climb to the top of the ranking!

A free life-size board game that brings new features every month.
